task_description: Facing the building to your East (approx. 99Â°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will first look up to find the roof.
I can see the top of the building, but now I need to look down to see the base to estimate the full height.

Having viewed both the top and the bottom of the building, I can now estimate its height; it appears to be about five stories tall, and assuming each story is roughly 3 meters, the total height is approximately 15 meters.
